title: A24算唔算近年最獨特既獨立電影發行商？

replies.msg:
近幾年美國唔少傳媒吹奏既電影公司，專做獨立電影發行，
近幾年發行過既戲，做左３年多啲已經片種豐富，
青春、cult、恐怖、血惺、迷幻、科幻、搞笑、紀錄乜都有，係差動畫
Spring Breakers
The Bling Ring
The Spectacular Now
Enemy
Under the Skin
Locke
Tusk
A Most Violent Year
While We're Young
Ex Machina
Amy
The End of the Tour
Room
The Witch
Krisha
Green Room
The Lobster
De Palma
Swiss Army Man
Equals
American Honey
Moonlight
20th Century Women

A24出品
期待今年it comes at night同under the silver lake
